short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Newtab Extension using AI to generate recipes for food and beverages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Aioli Sous Chef! Our AI-Generated Recipe Extension is here to revolutionize your kitchen experience. Imagine having a personal sous chef at your fingertips, ready to craft unique, delicious, and perfectly tailored recipes just for you. If you're not looking to harness the power of our advanced AI, we have more than 1000+ recipes to fulfill all your cooking needs as well!

This is a new tab extension that allows you to generate AI created recipes along with searching and filtering for any recipe. 

How to use: 
1. Type what you want to cook and search for your favorite recipe in our recipes search bar 
2. After your search results show, click on "Show Aioli Generated Recipes" to have our AI generate a recipe

This extension updates your browser New Tab and provides: 
- Search for recipe feature
- AI generated recipes 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Aioli Sous Chef Newtab as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://aiolisouschef.com/terms-of-service/?) and Policy (https://aiolisouschef.com/privacy-policy/?).
